import React, {useContext} from 'react'; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import {Button, Dropdown, Form} from "react-bootstrap"; import {Context} from "../../index"; const CreateDevice = ({show,onHide}) => { const {device} = useContext(Context) return ( Add new device
Choose your type {device.types.map(type => {type.name} )} Choose your brand {device.brands.map(brand => {brand.name} )}
); }; export default CreateDevice;
